<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Limited">
[Purifying Veil](/Spells.aspx?ID=1173)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Good" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=83" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 143

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Target** 1 Large or smaller creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Drawing on the purifying powers of water, you call forth a veil of fine water droplets suffused with holy energy. The veil surrounds the target. Everything on each side of the veil is [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) from creatures on the opposite side, but the water doesn't impede attacks or movement across the veil. If the target moves through the veil, it takes 4d6 good damage with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will save. If the target leaves the veil, the spell ends.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The good damage increases by 1d6.
name: Purifying Veil
